Text:
The Watchdog is waiting for prey outside the
Crimson Tower.
Once, he was the knight captain of a certain country.

With his white hair fluttering over his white
uniform, he casts the image of an ideal
defender of
the peace.

However, his true nature was that of a bloodthirsty
serial killer who stalked the streets at night.

One day, though, one of his colleagues caught him in
the act. In that moment, he became the White Demon.

Killing others gave me a sense of purpose. It made me
feel alive.

I stood at the top of the food chainâ€”at least that's
what I thought.
Until that moment...

The White Demon had struck fear into countless
hearts, but he was unable to lay so much as a
finger on Crimson.

He was unilaterally defeated and ended up having to
plea for his life.

Now, he works as a Watchdog. The freedom to kill was
stolen from him.
But now, I have my chance... Hehehehe!
The ghouls are running wild through the city...

When the Red Moon started, most of the vampires
left the tower. That meant there was no one left
to judge him.

As long as the Red Moon continued, he could kill as
he pleased.
If others can do it...why can't I?
Hurry up and let me slaughter someone!

As the White Demon waits for his target, he
practically prays that someone will come by 
the Crimson Tower.
Hyahahaha!
Huh?
Stay back, you scum!
That man...

The massive billhook, the glint in his eyes that
practically exudes violence... That's Juggernaut
the Tyrant, ruler of the Black Tower!
What...?!

Those distinctive nine tails, the mark of an elite
therianthrope! Is that Spirit Fox Yukime, ruler of
the White Tower?!

The two of them are way out of my league!
Why would they bother coming all the way out
here?!
Screw you, vixen!

What a positively...troublesome man you are.
I'd prefer if you'd stop spewing filth from that
big mouth of yours.
Only filth I smell is your foul beast breath!
Nobody likes a pushy man...you know!

Just as the two are about to clash again, a figure
dressed in a jet-black long coat silently descends
through the night.
Who the hell're you?!
Who might you be?

My name is Shadow. I lurk in the darkness and hunt
down shadows.
Shadow...?

It would seem he's the leader of that mysterious
armed group who've claimed Midgar as their turf.

Oh, the big shot behind that lot beating down those
arrogant priest bastards.
Well, not that I give a damn!
Screw this, I'm out. I'll kill you next time, vixen.
The Blood Moon... The rampage is starting...

Rampage... Are you referring to the ghouls running
wild?

It's that legend of the Red Moonâ€”the night said to
have led to the downfall of three kingdoms.

Fine by me. Maybe it'll liven up those bloodsuckers
and make them worth my time.
That man...
Well then, I shall also take my leave.

Word has it that you saved a number of girls from
the red-light district. I look forward to our paths
crossing again.

The entrance itself is an artifact... How could it
have been destroyed by a mere sword?

The Tyrant...the Spirit Fox he's at odds with...and
the Blood Queen they're pursuing... Monstrosities...
the lot of them.
As for me, I take pleasure in cutting down humans...

Hm? Who... Who's that? I can't seem to get any read
on his strength.
Wait, he's weaker than me, isn't he?
Hee... Hee-hee... Hee-hee-hee-hee!
You're the prey...I've been waiting for!
It's over.
...Hee?
(What...?)
(What...the hell...)

The White Demon now realizes that he has laid a hand
on someone he absolutely wasn't supposed to.
The Red Moon...
The rampage is starting...
There's no time...
Wha... What the hell...?!
